summary.span: 控件访问系统和用户环境变量。

span.span: Controls access to system and user environment variables.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 环境变量名称由一个或多个不区分大小写的名称列表（用分号分隔）指定，其中包含单独的列表以便对命名变量进行读写访问。Environment variable names are designated by one or more case-insensitive name lists separated by semicolons, with separate lists for read and write access to the named variables. 写访问权限包括创建和删除环境变量以及更改现有值的功能。Write access includes the ability to create and delete environment variables as well as to change existing values. > [!NOTE] > 在之前 .NET Framework 版本中 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] ，你可以使用 方法来防止无意中通过受信任代码访问系统资源。In versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], you could use the method to prevent inadvertent access to system resources by trusted code. 现已过时，并且现在仅由为程序集授予的权限集确定对资源的访问权限。 is now obsolete, and access to resources is now determined solely by the granted permission set for an assembly. 若要限制对文件的访问，必须在沙盒中运行部分受信任的代码，并仅向该代码允许访问的资源分配权限。To limit access to files, you must run partially trusted code in a sandbox and assign it permissions only to resources that the code is allowed to access. 有关在沙盒中运行应用程序的信息，请参阅 [如何：在沙盒中运行部分受信任的代码](/dotnet/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox)。For information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](/dotnet/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox).

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with either restricted or unrestricted permission as specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建完全受限制的 (`None`) 或对 `Unrestricted` 所有环境变量的访问权限。Creates either fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` access to all environment variables.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified access to the specified environment variables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数只允许指定其中一个 值。This constructor allows only one of the values to be specified. 此访问权限适用于所有列出的环境变量。This access applies to all listed environment variables. 用于 定义复杂的权限。Use to define complex permissions.

summary.span: 将指定的环境变量的访问权限添加到现有的权限状态中。

span.span: Adds access for the specified environment variables to the existing state of the permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过将添加到当前权限的状态，使用此方法修改环境变量访问。Use this method to modify environment variable access by adding to the state of the current permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的用法 。The following code example shows the use of the method. summary.span: 创建并返回当前权限的相同副本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限的副本表示对资源的相同访问权限。A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以获取当前权限的状态。Use this method to get the state of the current permission. 若要获取 `Read` 和 `Write` 访问状态，需要对此方法进行两次调用。To get both `Read` and `Write` access states requires two calls to this method. > [!NOTE] > `flag`参数限制为的值 ，这些值表示环境变量访问的单一类型。The `flag` parameter is limited to the values of , which represent single types of environment variable access. 这些值为 和 。Those values are and . 可接受的值 `flag` 不包括 和 ，这并不表示环境变量访问的单一类型。The values acceptable to `flag` do not include and , which do not represent single types of environment variable access. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的用法 。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要与当前权限相交的权限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建并返回一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的交集。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示当前权限和指定权限的交集的一个新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集为空，则此新权限为 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限的交集是描述它们共同描述的状态的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the state they both describe in common. 只有同时传递两个原始权限的请求才会传递交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.

exception.span: 参数不为 ，并且与当前权限不属于同一类型。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 将要测试子集关系的权限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 此权限必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果当前权限是指定权限的子集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限指定了完全包含在指定权限中的状态，则当前权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a state that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示对 C:\example.txt 的访问权限的权限是表示 C：访问权限的权限的子集 \\ 。For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. 如果此方法返回 `true` ，则当前权限表示对受保护资源的访问权限比指定权限更多。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission.

exception.span: 参数不为 ，并且与当前权限不属于同一类型。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示当前权限是否不受限制。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.

returns.span: 如果当前权限不受限制，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无限制权限表示权限的所有可能状态的联合。An unrestricted permission represents the union of all possible states of the permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission other) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (other As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: other
param.span: 与当前权限合并的权限。

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的并集。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示同时兼具当前权限和指定权限的新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用的结果 是一个权限，它表示当前权限和指定权限所表示的所有状态。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the states represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何传递任意权限的需求都将传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.

exception.span: 参数不为 ，并且与当前权限不属于同一类型。
